aboutpara: Hi there! ðŸ‘‹ I'm Chetan Sureka, a backend web developer passionate about creating seamless web experiences. With expertise in web app development, API design, and database optimization, I specialize in turning ideas into robust digital solutions. Let's build something amazing together!

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer & Student.
resume.description: Enthusiastic full stack developer pursuing B.Tech(Artificial Intelligence). I have worked upon End-to-end application development based on microservice architecture using skills such as Django, ReactJS, Kafka, Docker. I am passionate about learning new technologies.

experiences.position: Full Stack Developer Intern at Logiswift Express LLP.
experiences.bullets: Developed the web app using Python Django Framework, Built REST APIs using Django framework,Created a role based dashboard for Admin/Vendor/User, Designed developed and deployed microservices, Integrated responsive UI with the application, Responsible for designing Database Schema, Developed authentication layer using OAuth and JWT, Developed a Caching layer using Redis, Implemented Notification Service driven by Kafka

experiences.position: Python Developer Intern at SayHey TechLabs
experiences.bullets: Develop and train the AI model for the chatbot, Token Based authentication on microservices, Deploy the chatbot model on a scalable server, Create REST APIs to connect the UI to the chatbot server, Developed Speech-to-Text and Text-to-Speech API
